name: User Registration and Account Creation
description: Users can create new accounts with required personal information, secure passwords, and email verification to access enrollment features

scenarios.name: User successfully creates account with valid information

steps.text: I click the "Sign Up" button
I fill in the "First Name" field with "John"
I fill in the "Last Name" field with "Smith"
I fill in the "Username" field with "johnsmith123"
I fill in the "Email" field with "john.smith@example.com"
I fill in the "Password" field with "SecurePass123!"
I fill in the "Confirm Password" field with "SecurePass123!"
I click the "Sign Up" button
I should be redirected to the user dashboard
I should see a welcome message

scenarios.name: User creates account and receives welcome email

steps.text: I am on the registration form
I complete registration with valid information
I submit the registration form
I should receive a welcome email
the email should contain my account information

scenarios.name: Registration succeeds with minimum password requirements

steps.text: I am on the registration form
I enter a password with exactly 8 characters, one uppercase, one number, and one special character
I fill in all other required fields
I submit the form
the account should be created successfully

scenarios.name: User registration with special characters in name

steps.text: I am on the registration form
I fill in the "First Name" field with "José"
I fill in the "Last Name" field with "O'Connor"
I complete the remaining required fields
I submit the form
the account should be created successfully

scenarios.name: Registration with long but valid input values

steps.text: I am on the registration form
I enter maximum length values for all fields
I submit the form
the registration should complete successfully

scenarios.name: Alternative registration flow using different field order

steps.text: I am on the registration form
I fill in the password field first
I then complete the email and name fields
I submit the form
the registration should complete successfully

scenarios.name: Registration fails when required fields are empty

steps.text: I am on the registration form
I leave the <field> field empty
I fill in all other required fields
I click the "Sign Up" button
I should see an error message indicating <field> is required
the form should not be submitted

scenarios.name: Registration fails with invalid email format

steps.text: I am on the registration form
I fill in the "Email" field with "invalid-email-format"
I complete all other required fields
I submit the form
I should see an error message "Please enter a valid email address"
the form should not be submitted
I am on the registration form
I fill in the "Password" field with "weak"
I complete all other required fields
I submit the form
I should see password complexity error messages
the form should not be submitted
a user account with username "existinguser" already exists
I am on the registration form
I fill in the "Username" field with "existinguser"
I complete all other required fields
I submit the form
I should see an error message "Username already exists"
the form should not be submitted

scenarios.name: Password validation with various invalid formats

steps.text: I am on the registration form
I enter <password> in the password field
I submit the form
I should see <error_message>

scenarios.name: Email field accepts valid email formats

steps.text: I am on the registration form
I enter <email> in the email field
I complete all other required fields
I submit the form
the email should be accepted

scenarios.name: Username field boundary - minimum length acceptance

steps.text: I am on the registration form
I enter a username with the minimum allowed length
I complete all other required fields
I submit the form
the username should be accepted

scenarios.name: Form submission disabled until all required fields completed

steps.text: I am on the registration form
I have not filled in all required fields
the "Sign Up" button should be disabled
I should not be able to submit the form

gherkin_content:
Feature: User Registration and Account Creation
  Users can create new accounts with required personal information, secure passwords, and email verification to access enrollment features

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: User successfully creates account with valid information
    Given I click the "Sign Up" button
    When I fill in the "First Name" field with "John"
    And I fill in the "Last Name" field with "Smith"
    And I fill in the "Username" field with "johnsmith123"
    And I fill in the "Email" field with "john.smith@example.com"
    And I fill in the "Password" field with "SecurePass123!"
    And I fill in the "Confirm Password" field with "SecurePass123!"
    And I click the "Sign Up" button
    Then I should be redirected to the user dashboard
    And I should see a welcome message

  @positive @email
  Scenario: User creates account and receives welcome email
    Given I am on the registration form
    When I complete registration with valid information
    And I submit the registration form
    Then I should receive a welcome email
    And the email should contain my account information

  @positive @validation
  Scenario: Registration succeeds with minimum password requirements
    Given I am on the registration form
    When I enter a password with exactly 8 characters, one uppercase, one number, and one special character
    And I fill in all other required fields
    And I submit the form
    Then the account should be created successfully

  @positive @edge-case
  Scenario: User registration with special characters in name
    Given I am on the registration form
    When I fill in the "First Name" field with "José"
    And I fill in the "Last Name" field with "O'Connor"
    And I complete the remaining required fields
    And I submit the form
    Then the account should be created successfully

  @positive @boundary
  Scenario: Registration with long but valid input values
    Given I am on the registration form
    When I enter maximum length values for all fields
    And I submit the form
    Then the registration should complete successfully

  @positive @alternative
  Scenario: Alternative registration flow using different field order
    Given I am on the registration form
    When I fill in the password field first
    And I then complete the email and name fields
    And I submit the form
    Then the registration should complete successfully

  @negative @validation
  Scenario: Registration fails when required fields are empty
    Given I am on the registration form
    When I leave the <field> field empty
    And I fill in all other required fields
    And I click the "Sign Up" button
    Then I should see an error message indicating <field> is required
    And the form should not be submitted

  @negative @validation
  Scenario: Registration fails with invalid email format
    Given I am on the registration form
    When I fill in the "Email" field with "invalid-email-format"
    And I complete all other required fields
    And I submit the form
    Then I should see an error message "Please enter a valid email address"
    And the form should not be submitted

  @negative @validation
  Scenario: Registration fails with weak password
    Given I am on the registration form
    When I fill in the "Password" field with "weak"
    And I complete all other required fields
    And I submit the form
    Then I should see password complexity error messages
    And the form should not be submitted

  @negative @validation
  Scenario: Registration fails with duplicate username
    Given a user account with username "existinguser" already exists
    And I am on the registration form
    When I fill in the "Username" field with "existinguser"
    And I complete all other required fields
    And I submit the form
    Then I should see an error message "Username already exists"
    And the form should not be submitted

  @negative @validation
  Scenario: Password validation with various invalid formats
    Given I am on the registration form
    When I enter <password> in the password field
    And I submit the form
    Then I should see <error_message>

  @edge-case @validation
  Scenario: Email field accepts valid email formats
    Given I am on the registration form
    When I enter <email> in the email field
    And I complete all other required fields
    And I submit the form
    Then the email should be accepted

  @edge-case @boundary
  Scenario: Username field boundary - minimum length acceptance
    Given I am on the registration form
    When I enter a username with the minimum allowed length
    And I complete all other required fields
    And I submit the form
    Then the username should be accepted

  @edge-case @usability
  Scenario: Form submission disabled until all required fields completed
    Given I am on the registration form
    When I have not filled in all required fields
    Then the "Sign Up" button should be disabled
    And I should not be able to submit the form
